Welcome!

This is a site about STORIES

This site is all about stories. We all love a good story. It's inherent in everyone, yet it's not something we all try to understand to the fullest extent. But now that you've found this blog, maybe that'll change. What makes a good story? How about a good book, tv show, movie, or video game? Why do we enjoy any of these things at all? These are questions that I want to tackle head on. I will be wrong. But hopefully I'll learn more and come out a better analyst of the stories I consume. And become a better storyteller myself. If you want to join my adventure, check out the site every now and them. I'll be writing reviews, articles, and perhaps some stories of my own. Hopefully, you'll gather something new and useful in your perusing of what I have to offer. If not, I wish you the best in whatever else you choose to spend your time on.
